about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of SCP-9735-Alpha: ΔRCH1TECT, located in the icy terrains of Alaska in 2023. Take control of Leah Davison, an IRL streamer with a passion for exploring abandoned places. While searching for new lost places in Alaska, Leah stumbled upon what appeared to be an abandoned SCP Foundation site. He decided to enter and investigate. However, he quickly realized that something was deeply amiss.

In the game, you will:

  • Explore: Navigate through an entire SCP Foundation, where narrow hallways and rooms are part of your daily routine.

  • Complete tasks: Whether it's traveling from one location to another or solving mathematical puzzles, you'll face a variety of challenges.

Your journey through SCP-9735-Alpha will be a unique exploration filled with secrets, challenges, and the world of SCP-9735-Alpha. Uncover the true nature of this extraordinary phenomenon and leave your mark on the history of the SCP Foundation.

Game Features:

  • High-Quality Graphics: Enjoy an enhanced experience with high-quality graphics that bring the game's world to life.

  • Exploration: The game focuses on exploration, exploring SCP-9735-Alpha with a touch of horror.

  • Non-Horror Mode: Option for a non-horror mode if you prefer to focus on exploration and uncovering the story without the horror elements.

This game may contain content not suitable for all ages: Depiction of blood, corpses, and possibly general adult content!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages: Depiction of blood, corpses, and possibly general adult content!

name: SCP-9735-Alpha: ΔRCH1TECT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570K 3.4 GHz 4 Core or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X 3.6 GHz 6 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommend
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i9-9900K 3.6 GHz 8 Core or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X 3,6 GHz 8 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommend

short_description: Step into the role of streamer Leah Davison, known as Intries. During an IRL live stream in 2023, he explores an abandoned SCP Foundation area and gets into trouble. Find a way to freedom and experience Leah's story! Can you save him?
supported_languages:
English*, German, Indonesian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
